sentences.en: Davis won the 400 metre hurdles in a new Olympic time of 49.3 sec.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯以49.3秒这一新的奥运会记录在400米跨栏赛跑中夺冠。

sentences.en: Hurdling events are dashes in which competitions must clear a series of ten barriers called hurdles.
sentences.cn: 在跨栏项目中,运动员需要跨过十个栏.

sentences.en: Hurdling events are dashes in which competitors must clear a series of ten barriers called hurdles.
sentences.cn: 在跨栏跑项目中运动员需要跨过十个栏.

sentences.en: The running and hurdling competitions make up the track events.
sentences.cn: 径赛项目有跑步和障碍两种.

words.tran_cn: 制造竹篱笆者；跳栏比赛选手

phrases.tran_cn: n. 障碍竞赛；跳栏赛跑

trans.tran_en: the sport of racing over hurdles
